name: GitBook
description: GitBook is a modern documentation platform that empowers teams to create and publish API and product documentationâ€”often the first touchpoint for users exploring a feature or product. Understanding that great documentation is as vital as the product itself, GitBook transforms static pages into dynamic, AI-powered knowledge experiences that evolve alongside your product. With an intuitive interface and seamless integrations, GitBook makes it easy to keep documentation fresh, relevant, and genuinely engaging.
shortDescription: GitBook is a modern documentation platform that empowers teams to create and publish API and product documentation.
